paper_abstract: A new optimization-based synchronized flux corrected conservative interpolation (remapping) of mass, momentum and energy for arbitrary Lagrangian Eulerian method is developed. Fluxes of conserved variables (mass, momentum and total energy) are limited in a synchronous FCT-like way to preserve local bounds in density, velocity and specific internal energy. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Synchronized flux corrected remapping for ALE methods
